biotools.summary: MemBlob web application calculates the membrane boundaries of transmembrane proteins using cryo-EM densities. The membrane environment used during transmembrane protein structure determination cannot be resolved at the atomic level, but it produces density, which can be utilized to dissect the membrane embedded part of the protein.

bioschemas.name: MemBlob
